name: Tic-Tac-Toe (TransGame668)
description: It's a simple game that i made that required to match the O/X 3 times for win, If its "Draw" that means no one wins. To start, Touch the small icon (o/x) to change the player. you can play this in 1-2 players or watch themselves playing in Computer mode. Touch the green object for showing the O/X and beat "Computer". There is no score and timer in here, but at least you having fun with the lake background that i get from my phone camera. Exit press "alt+f4"
